Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/2109547785992548352/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Structured Mock Exam Generator by Topic"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/2109547785992548352/)_"
---
Create a mock exam in [TARGETLANGUAGE] for [PROMPT] using my preferred format:
- Title and clear instructions
- Divide into sections by topic
- Use a mix of definition, comparison, and scenario-based questions
- Assign marks to each section
- Include real-life application questions
- Provide two separate downloadable files: one for questions and another for answers (PDF, DOCX, or TXT)
PromptHint: [PROMPT] = course or subject name (e.g., Basic Statistics with R, Foundations of Mathematics)   [TARGETLANGUAGE] = English, French, etc.
